name: A Dog To Rescue
description:
Go after your dog in this puzzle bridge building game, created for GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme 'Joined together'. Chop down trees, don't forget which bridge parts to build where and don't go to far from your dog!

Made in 48h with Unity 2020.3 and Game Creator by gypynkt (Sebastian Graetz), with original music by Tunglith. This was the first time trying myself on a bridge building game, there are a lot of things unfinished.

AD to move, E to interact, choose building materials with mouse click.

Known bugs:

  • When the dog runs away, the game doesn't restart. Close with Alt+F4 and restart
  • Same when the game is finished, the end screen doesn't get triggered.
  • The Button prompts are not on the player as they should
  • The building menu is only accessible via mouse instead of keyboard
  • Gathered materials cannot be dropped, so be careful what you pick up...
